summary: Promising to make a delivery for a dying man, the blind swordsman Zatoichi comes across the usual crime gangs but also meets a blind monk who brings into question his use of violence.
cast: Shintarô Katsu|Shigeru Amachi|Jun Hamamura|Mayumi Ogawa|Kei Satô|Kôichi Mizuhara|Michi Azuma|Saburô Date|Jun Fujikawa|Yukio Horikita|Sumao Ishihara|Gen Kimura|Kanae Kobayashi|Yukiko Komura|Hideo Kuroki|Masanori Machida|Kazue Tamaki|Kazuko Taniguchi|Mitsuko Yoshikawa
title: Zatôichi no uta ga kikoeru
